metadata.name: GNS1S
metadata.description:
*"We come spinning out of nothingness, scattering stars like the dust." -Rūmī*

A video artwork to portray the metaphysical conception of the beginning, inspired by the eastern mysticism and nature principles. The spinning fabric has been created with live shooting, composed with a classical animation technique called slit-scan. This enables an object to differentiate time inside a picture, generating a spin-like motion by seeing past and future simultaneously.

The collector receives a digital Certificate of Authenticity, with exclusive access to a high quality .MOV (ProRes codec) file stored on IPFS.

_**GNS1S**
1/1 Edition, NFT, 00:10 sec (seamless loop)
1440 x 1080px, 25fps, MP4 (h.264 codec)
[ACCI BABA](https://accibaba.com), 2022_

Verisart Certified:
[https://verisart.com/works/acci-baba-66925257-02c4-4d3a-a67c-0ee3bc87c148](https://verisart.com/works/acci-baba-66925257-02c4-4d3a-a67c-0ee3bc87c148)
